name: Luster Beasts
description:
Luster Beasts is a tactical JRPG creature collection game. In Luster Beasts the player will be given complete control over their party. This will allow them to fully customize their move sets, as well as their stats, giving players a lot more control over their team than other games in their genre. The goal is to clear as many opponent's teams as possible in order to gain high scores.

How high will your high score be?
